metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0697 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Inappropriate implementation in Full screen mode in Google Chrome onAndroid prior to 110.0.5481.77 allowed a remote attacker to spoof thecontents of the security UI via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium securityseverity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
